title: Mixed-Methods-Based Workshop for Strengthening Digital Learning Pathway Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical theory and experience in utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service and in-service teachers to develop digital learning pathway design competencies in smartphone-centric constrained technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can self-diagnose their digital learning path perception type based on four cluster criteria.
Learners can explain the three dimensions of digital learning justification based on internet-based epistemology, self-regulated learning, and inquiry community frameworks.
Through project-based tasks, learners can compare/analyze various digital learning path types and select context-appropriate tools.
Learners can propose strategies that consider learners' affective responses (emotional cognition) when designing digital learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
